com.se.simplicity.rendering
Interface Camera

public interface Camera

A viewpoint within a SceneGraph.

Author:
Gary Buyn

Method Summary
 void apply()
           Applies this Camera to the rendering environment.
 Node getNode()
           Retrieves the Node that represents this Camera's location and orientation.
 Camera getPickCamera(Pick pick)
           Retrieves a picking viewpoint adapted from this Camera's viewpoint.
 TransformationMatrixf getTransformation()
           Retrieves the absolute transformation for the Node of this Camera.
 void init()
           Initialises this Camera.
 boolean isInitialised()
           Determines if this Camera is initialised.
 void setInitialised(boolean isInitialised)
           Sets the initialisation status.
 void setNode(Node node)
           Sets the Node that represents this Camera's location and orientation.
 

Method Detail

apply

void apply()

Applies this Camera to the rendering environment.

getNode

Node getNode()

Retrieves the Node that represents this Camera's location and orientation.

Returns:
The Node that represents this Camera's location and orientation.

getPickCamera

Camera getPickCamera(Pick pick)

Retrieves a picking viewpoint adapted from this Camera's viewpoint.

Parameters:
pick - The pick to create the viewpoint for.
Returns:
The picking viewpoint.

getTransformation

TransformationMatrixf getTransformation()

Retrieves the absolute transformation for the Node of this Camera.

Returns:
The absolute transformation for the Node of this Camera, or null if the Node does not exist.

init

void init()

Initialises this Camera.

isInitialised

boolean isInitialised()

Determines if this Camera is initialised.

Returns:
True if this Camera is initialised, false otherwise.

setInitialised

void setInitialised(boolean isInitialised)

Sets the initialisation status.

Parameters:
isInitialised - Determines if this Camera is initialised.

setNode

Parameters:
